# Sugarcoat Salon in Hennur | Hair, Beauty, Makeup & Nail Services Bangalore

Premium hair, makeup, nail & beauty services at Sugarcoat Salon in Hennur, Bangalore. From hair treatments to luxe facials, relax, refresh, and reinvent your style.

## General Information

- [About Us](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/#about): Learn more about Sugarcoat Salon, its mission, and the team dedicated to providing exceptional beauty services.
- [Contact Us](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/contact): Get in touch with Sugarcoat Salon for inquiries or to book an appointment.
- [Location](https://www.google.com/maps?sca_esv=fc7df528f7b59b64&sxsrf=AE3TifNPk8VxjIJxXw5BaKUyUAAFyS5HOQ:1753153424514&gs_lp=Egxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAiCXN1Z2FyY29hdCoCCAAyCxAuGIAEGMcBGK8BMggQABiABBixAzIFEAAYgAQyBRAAGIAEMgUQABiABDIFEAAYgAQyBRAAGIAEMgUQABiABDIFEAAYgAQyBRAAGIAEMhoQLhiABBjHARivARiXBRjcBBjeBBjgBNgBAUjSFlAAWJMLcAB4AZABAJgBgAGgAZMIqgEDMC45uAEByAEA-&um=1&ie=UTF-8&fb=1&gl=in&sa=X&geocode=KQ3IujkdG647MdDdlZRpu8H3&daddr=1st+Floor,+Capital+Market,+Hennur+Main+Road,+near+Kanakashree+Housing+Society,+Kanakasree+Housing+Society,+Kannuru,+Bengaluru,+Karnataka+560077): Visit us at 1st Floor, Capital Market, Hennur Main Road, near Kanakashree Housing Society, Kannuru, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560077.

- [WhatsApp](https://wa.link/bd3zyj): Connect with us via WhatsApp for quick communication and service inquiries.

## Services Offered

- [Services & Pricing](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/services): Explore the range of beauty services offered at Sugarcoat Salon along with their pricing.
- [Bridal MakeUp](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/services/bridal-party-makeup): Specialized makeup services for brides to ensure they look stunning on their special day.
- [Haircut & Styling](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/services/haircut-styling): Professional haircut and styling services tailored to individual preferences.
- [Nails Extensions](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/services/nail-extensions): Enhance your nails with our expert nail extension services.
- [Facial & Skincare](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/services/facial-skin-care): Rejuvenate your skin with our luxurious facial and skincare treatments.
- [Botox Treatment](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/services/botox-treatment): Anti-aging treatments to help you achieve a youthful appearance.
- [Keratin Treatment](https://sugarcoatsalon.in/services/keratin-treatment): Hair smoothing treatments to enhance shine and manageability.
